workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 2.2 - Takin' It Easy
workout_file.description: We're takin' it easy today with a zone 2 workout with alternating intervals of comfortable and fast cadence.

textevent.message: We have an easy day on tap for today :-)
Let's start with a warmup and get right into it.
Make sure you have your fan, towel, and fluids handy.
So far so good? Let's rundown what's in store for today.
As you can see, today is an easy zone 2 focused workout.
With some high cadence work thrown into the mix as well.
So, turn some relaxing tunes on, or gear up a podcast and just enjoy today :-)
1min left here, then we're settling into zone 2.
All right, let's start with 20mins at zone 2 at a comfortable cadence.
I also want to mix up the on-bike position during this interval, but let's start on the hoods for now.
Okay, bring your hands down to the drops, or TT bars, and let's get aero here.
Get low and stay low :-)
Practicing your aero position is an easy way to reduce your drag and go faster outside.
Practically for free too! It does take some practice and flexibility though.
But, Zwift is a perfect medium for exactly that.
If you need to come back to the hoods again, feel free to at any time.
But, try to stay on the drops/TT bars for as long as possible here.
That's halfway through here. Make sure you're also drinking frequently today too.
Even though today is easy, drinking is still paramount, plus it maintains the habit of doing so.
Have you been able to stay in your aero position the entire time here?
Great work if so! If not, this is just another aspect to work on and practice more :-).
All right, coming up in 1min we'll alternate fast and comfortable cadence.
More specifically, 1min at 110+ RPM, and 2mins at 85 RPM, 10 times.
You may come back to the hoods again for these, or not if you're comfortable still.
Start spinning the legs up to 110+ RPM...
GO GO GO! Fast feet, but good form here.
So no bouncing or lurching in the saddle, and keep your upper body relaxed.
Nicely done, now let's resume 85 RPM.
FAST FEET! Keep the shoulders relaxed here and a light grip on the bars.
Back to a comfortable cadence again now. Great work so far today!
UP UP UP! Make the transition to fast cadence nice and smooth.
Excellent work, back down to a comfortable cadence again now.
GO GO GO!
FAST FEET! Maintain your form here.
Halfway through here, UP UP!
Good work here! Remember, shoulders relaxed, elbows bent, light grip on the bars.
Almost at the finish line now - FAST FEET!
Last high cadence effort, make it a good one!
Nicely done! Let's keep spinning for a couple more minutes, then we'll cooldown.
Way to go, my friend! Another workout in the books :-)
Let's cooldown for a few minutes here, then hop off the bike
See you next time :-)
